abstractText: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā containing the first khaṇḍa (chapters 1-12). On folio 1v, an incomplete miniature is framed by double vertical frame lines in red ink.
abstractShort: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā containing the first khaṇḍa (chapters 1-12).
title: Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā
